name: unreinforced
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
An unreinforced building is made of materials, such as bricks or concrete, that do not contain metal rods to make them stronger: Two people were killed when the two-story unreinforced brick structure collapsed. Unreinforced masonry buildings are generally recognized as most likely to collapse in an earthquake. Related word
reinforce
More examplesFewer examplesMore than half of Manhattan's buildings are built of unreinforced masonry.Officials ordered cities to address the hazards posed by unreinforced brick buildings.The quake damaged unreinforced adobe buildings in villages throughout the area.
